SEARCH
Package view

Class TextualUI

java.lang.Object
view.TextualUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class TextualUI extends Object implements View
The TextualUI class represents the textual user interface for the game. It implements the View interface and provides methods for displaying game information and interacting with the user.

    Constructs a TextualUI object.

    • TextualUI

      public TextualUI()
      Constructs a TextualUI object. Initializes the output stream to the standard output.

  • Method Details

    • initGame

      public void initGame()
      Initializes a new game. This method performs the necessary setup and preparations for starting a new game.
      Specified by:
      initGame in interface View

    • endGame

      public void endGame(String esito)
      Ends the game and displays the outcome. This method prints the provided outcome message to the standard output.
      Specified by:
      endGame in interface View
      Parameters:
      esito - The outcome message to be displayed.

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the game. This method clears the user interface, then prints a welcome message and the game logo to the standard output.
      Specified by:
      init in interface View

    • showMatchInfo

      public void showMatchInfo(Tile[][] copy, List<CommonGoals> commonGoals, Tile[][] myShelf, PersonalGoal pg)
      Shows the match information on the user interface. This method clears the user interface and then prints the current dashboard state, the layout of the common goal card, the shelf, and the personal goal card associated with the player.
      Specified by:
      showMatchInfo in interface View
      Parameters:
      copy - The copy of the dashboard state.
      commonGoals - The list of common goals.
      myShelf - The shelf of the player.
      pg - The personal goal card associated with the player.

    • printPersonalGoal

      public void printPersonalGoal(PersonalGoal pg)
      Prints the personal goal card on the user interface.
      Specified by:
      printPersonalGoal in interface View
      Parameters:
      pg - The personal goal card to be printed.

    • shownewMex

      public void shownewMex()
      Displays a new message notification on the user interface. This method prints the text "New message" in yellow color on the console.
      Specified by:
      shownewMex in interface View

    • showGameChat

      public void showGameChat(List<GameMessage> listToDisplay)
      Displays the game chat messages on the user interface. If the provided list of game messages is not empty, it prints the sender's name and the content of each message. If the list is empty, it prints a notification indicating that there are no messages to display yet.
      Specified by:
      showGameChat in interface View
      Parameters:
      listToDisplay - The list of game messages to be displayed.

    • printDashboard

      public void printDashboard(Tile[][] copy)
      Prints the dashboard on the user interface. The dashboard is represented by a two-dimensional array of tiles. Each tile's color is printed according to its corresponding position in the array.
      Specified by:
      printDashboard in interface View
      Parameters:
      copy - The two-dimensional array representing the dashboard.

    • printShelf

      public void printShelf(Tile[][] myShelf)
      Prints the shelf and the personal goal card associated with the player on the user interface. The shelf is represented by a two-dimensional array of tiles. Each tile's color is printed according to its corresponding position in the array.
      Specified by:
      printShelf in interface View
      Parameters:
      myShelf - The two-dimensional array representing the shelf and personal goal card.

    • printCommonGoal

      public void printCommonGoal(List<CommonGoals> commonGoals)
      Prints the common goal cards on the user interface. Each common goal card contains a layout and an available score.
      Specified by:
      printCommonGoal in interface View
      Parameters:
      commonGoals - A list of CommonGoals objects representing the common goal cards.

    • clearUI

      public void clearUI()
      Clears the user interface by printing special escape characters that move the cursor to the top-left position and then flushes the output stream.
